reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty and versatile, able to be dressed up or down, while appreciating its super soft texture and perfect fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater for fall!
items.body: Love the feel and fit of this sweater. I wear a medium and ordered a medium and it fit perfect. I will buy more colors of this beautiful sweater! The pink is so bright! Great find for me! Read more
items.author: Rhona

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Love!! This sweater! The quality is amazing, and it’s very warm. You don’t need a tank under it but it does have some cool designs that can be see through. I’d definitely recommend a nude colored bra under it. The fabric is stretchy so it does form the fit you. True to size! Read more
items.author: Shelby Foster

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and soft
items.body: This sweater is soft and comfortable, such a pretty color. However it is sort of an open weave and you need to wear something under it. It also runs a little tiny bit large. But I love it and I love the Christmas tree earrings shown in the photograph. I would have given it five stars except for the see-through nature. Read more
items.author: Deborah G. Carver

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and stretchy
items.body: Very soft and stretchy! The product looked like the picture, it was true to size , and very fitting, great winter sweater . The holes in it will make you feel cold so I suggest a long sleeve under it Read more
items.author: daisy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater, reasonable price
items.body: I ordered a small, fit was true to size, good quality, the material is comfortable and pretty warm (I work in an office and it's always chilly, so it was comfortable to wear in the office without being too hot even in the summer), the color is at it appears in the photo. I actually ordered another in green, and happy with both. Price was very reasonable. I did not need any sort of camisole or tank top underneath, I was thinking I might due to the small holes in the design, but wearing a neutral beige bra worked fine and it wasn't revealing. Read more
items.author: Susie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and soft
items.body: Super soft and comfortable. Exactly what I hoped it would be. Accurate sizing and fit. Read more
items.author: Liz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater
items.body: Well made, true to size, comfortable, very soft & arrived just as advertised. Read more
items.author: MS

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars So disappointed
items.body: The sweater is pretty, the caramel color is so nice and warm. I got it in a vacuum sealed packaging, when I opened it was permanently wrinkled, I can't wear it. So disappointed. Read more
items.author: anahit avagyan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Four Leaf Clover, Bright Pink, Beige, Racing Red, Phalaenopsis, Smoke Gray, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Oatmeal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
